name: Cyd's Christmas Snack
author: chenardgirl
summary: This recipe comes from my mom's homemade nuts-and-bolts recipe. Not being a huge fan of the mixed ingredients, I chose my favorite one and then spiced it up. Careful, it's addictive! Store in a large paper towel-lined container.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package crispy corn and rice cereal (such as Crispix®)
2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Pour cereal into a large roasting pan
Melt butter in a microwave-safe bowl, about 90 seconds
Mix in Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, Cajun seasoning, onion powder, seasoned salt, and garlic powder
Pour mixture over cereal, coating evenly
Bake in the preheated oven, tossing every 15 minutes, until crispy, about 1 hour
